finalMandatesForm.main.heading: Congratulations! Your mandate has been launched successfully. It will be live on Arisio once it gets approved by Admin within a day.
finalMandatesForm.card.heading2: Once you have created and launched your mandate, you can manage this mandate in your mandate dashboard.
finalMandatesForm.card.heading4: When startups apply for your mandate, you can see their profile and analysis inside application section on dashboard.
finalMandatesForm.card.heading6: Once you have gone through startup profiles, you can either shortlist them to meet now or you can watch them on Arisio for future engagements.
